# Wire
Basically a zero-tick redstone repeater.

## Obtaining
This block can be broken with any tool, as well as the fist.<br/>
It can be crafted using the following crafting recipe:<br/>
<br/>
![Crafting recipe](data:image/png;base64,)
<br/>
<table>
	<tr><td>-</td><td>Redstone torch</td><td>-</td></tr>
	<tr><td>-</td><td>Stone</td><td>-</td></tr>
	<tr><td>-</td><td>-</td><td>-</td></tr>
</table>

## Behavior
The wire behaves the same as a redstone repeater would, except it has a zero tick delay.

## Data values
### Block ID
`logicgates:wire`

### Block states
| Blockstate  | Values                           | Description                          |
| :---------- | :------------------------------- | :----------------------------------- |
| `facing`    | `east`, `west`, `north`, `south` | The direction the block is facing.  |
| `powered`   | `true`, `false` | Whether the block is recieving redstone power. |
